title: LFM Ranked Team Rebuild (S1)
body:
Hey all,

We are currently looking to rebuild our team up, with people who can keep a cool head when behind and not flame,learn from mistakes and be open to advice from the team as a whole (nobody is perfect and can always improve on things)

Currently are sitting at Silver 1, through our climb so far we have always skipped divisions so we have hopes to continue climbing the same way.

Once we have our solid 5 we will set times for games and practice
most likely will be week nights from 6pm onwards and Sundays.

We are looking for Top, Mid

IGN: 
Age:
Current Rank(not really important):
Main Role:
Top Champs:
Secondary Role:
Top Champs:
Voice chat is a must, currently we are using Skype

Or add me in game xAerOx and let me know what role you want to go for,

replies.body:

Secondary Role: Jungle
Top Champs: Rek'sai, Evelynn, Jarvan, Vi
Have skype, ts, curse voice

I am also active everyday, on weekdays im on around 4:30pm and on weekends im active all day
